title: The Blight's First Touch
goal: The Whispering Corruption manifests more clearly, drawing Kaelen's focused attention.

beats.summary: A localized incident occurs – a strange illness, unnaturally aggressive wildlife, or a sudden, localized decay of plant life.
Kaelen's dormant senses react strongly, recognizing the ancient signature of the Whispering Corruption.
He intervenes, using a flicker of forgotten magic to mitigate the immediate threat, drawing curious or fearful stares.
